Antioxidant activity was monitored by measuring the absorbance at 517 nm wavelength. The antioxidant activities of M. fruticosa serpyllifolia VOs and Trolox were assessed by their ability to donate a hydrogen atom or electron and were identified from converting the deep violet color of a methanol solution of DPPH to colorless or pale yellow; for that, the inhibition percentage of DPPH activity was used to determine the antioxidant activity of M. fruticosa serpyllifolia VOs and Trolox using the following equation (Inhibition% of antioxidant activity [ 6]):
